elements.content: <ce:section-title>Abstract</ce:section-title><ce:simple-para view="all">The new compounds [{(Ph<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiOLi)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O · (C<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O)}<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(C<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)]<ce:inf loc="post">∞</ce:inf>(C<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> = DABCO = 1,4-diazobicyclo[2.2.2]octane) an [{(Ph<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiOLi)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O · (C<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O)}<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> · 2(C<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]<ce:inf loc="post">∞</ce:inf>(C<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> = 4,4′-bipy = 4,4′-bipyridine) hav been synthesised using the dilithium salt [(Ph<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiOLi)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O]<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> in the presence of the Lewis bases DABCO and 4,4′-bipy respectively. Their solid-state structures have been determined by single-crystal X-ray diffraction. Comparisons between these compounds and the related pyridine (py) adduct [(Ph<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiOLi)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O · 2py]<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> and dioxane adduct [{(Ph<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>SiOLi)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> · 3(C<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)]<ce:inf loc="post">t8</ce:inf> are discussed.</ce:simple-para>
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

The new compounds [{(Ph2SiOLi)2O ⋅ (C4H8O)}2(C6H12N2)]∞(C6H12N2 = DABCO = 1,4-diazobicyclo[2.2.2]octane) an [{(Ph2SiOLi)2O ⋅ (C4H8O)}2 ⋅ 2(C10H8N2]∞(C10H8N2 = 4,4'-bipy = 4,4'-bipyridine) hav been synthesised using the dilithium salt [(Ph2SiOLi)2O]2 in the presence of the Lewis bases DABCO and 4,4'-bipy respectively. Their solid-state structures have been determined by single-crystal X-ray diffraction. Comparisons between these compounds and the related pyridine (py) adduct [(Ph2SiOLi)2O ⋅ 2py]2 and dioxane adduct [{(Ph2SiOLi)2O}2 ⋅ 3(C4H8O2)]t8 are discussed.
